Berry Bickle (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1959) bụ onye mba Zimbabwe na-ese ihe nke bi na Maputo
A mụrụ ya na Bulawayo, Bickle gụrụ akwụkwọ na  Chisipite Senior School na Harare

Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara Durban Institute of Technology, ebe ọ nwetara nzere diplọma mba na nka, na Mahadum Rhodes nke mba South Africa, ebe o nwetara nzere mastas na nka. Bickle bụ onye guzobere Bulawayo's Visual Artists' Association.

Ọ na-ekewa oge ya n'etiti Zimbabwe na Mozambique, ọrụ ya na-enyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mpaghara ahụ. N'afọ 1988, ya na Tapfuma Gutsa haziri nzukọ Pachipamwe, nzukọ Triangle Art Trust nke mbụ a haziri na Afrịka. N'afọ 2010, ọ ghọrọ Rockefeller Foundation Creative Arts Fellow ma na-arụ ọrụ na Rockefeller Foundation Bellagio Center na usoro Suite Europa

Berry Bickle bụ onye na-ese ihe na multimedia nke na-arụ ọrụ na ntinye, ihe onyonyo, foto, na ceramik. Ọrụ ya bụ n'ozuzu nrụnye, ọ bụkwa ọrụ mgbasa ozi agwakọta nke gụnyere edemede; ụfọdụ gụnyere ihe onyonyo na foto

Bickle na onye mba Zimbabwe na-ahụ maka ụrọ, Marjorie Wallace, na-arụkọ ọrụ nke ọma. Ya na onye na-ese ihe na mba Peru bụ Adrian Velasquez arụkọla ọrụ.
Ihe ngosi ahụ na mbipụta Inscribing Meaning: Writing and Graphic Systems in African Art na-egosipụta ọnụnọ nke ederede na ọrụ Bickle na mkpa ọ dị ime ihe na ịnakọta okwu; na usoro a, onye na-ese ihe na-edepụta ọrụ ya "Re-Writes".
A na-egosipụta ọrụ Berry Bickle na mba ụwa
N'afọ 2011, Bickle nọchitere anya Zimbabwe na Venice Biennale, n'oge ahụ ọ bụ ihe na-adịghị ahụkebe maka mba Afrịka. Pavilion Zimbabwe, nke Raphael Chikukwa haziri, akpọrọ "Ịhụ Onwe Anyị".
